path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Cowboy Snake Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has privileges to lock and unlock even after renouncing ownership.

findings.title: Owner can mint any amount of tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to mint any amount of tokens without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable minting
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable minting of tokens.

findings.title: Owner can change _numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the number of tokens sold to add liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable antibot
findings.description: The owner has privileges to enable and disable antibot functionality.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable swapWhiteList and limitSell
findings.description: The owner has privileges to enable and disable swapWhiteList and limitSell which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change fee wallet
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the fee wallet.

findings.title: Owner can change fee value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee value.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from fees
findings.description: The owner has the capability to exclude certain entities or addresses from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract tokens and BNBs
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw contract tokens and BNBs.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions modifyWhiteListSender(), modifyWhiteListReceiver(), modifyBlackList(), modifyWhiteListBot(), and modifyWhiteListPool() use a loop to iterate through addresses from the function argument lists, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.
